ideas.title: 25 Things I Believe In to Build Great Products
ideas.description: What I believe in is often the opposite of how big companies like to work
hooks: Secrets Big Tech Doesn't Want You to Know About Product Design
How I Build Products Differently (Live Breakdown)
25 Rules That Destroy Traditional Product Development

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction
Pre-promote stream with teaser clips highlighting controversial beliefs
Use community tab to poll audience about their product beliefs beforehand

visualDirection.description: High-energy split-screen design with dynamic motion graphics, bold sans-serif typography in electric blue and charcoal, animated transition cards for each belief, live chat overlay with animated reactions, picture-in-picture host with minimal tech-inspired background, rapid visual rhythm matching conversational pace

exampleOutline: Section 1: High-Energy Intro & Stream Setup
Section 2: Context - Why Traditional Product Design Is Broken
Section 3: Reveal 25 Beliefs (Interactive Live Breakdown)
Section 4: Deep Dive into Most Controversial Beliefs
Section 5: Live Q&A, Audience Interaction, Final Call-to-Action

ideas.title: Here are the launches and landings we’re most excited about in 2026
ideas.description: Here are the launches and landings we’re most excited about in 2026
hooks: Rocket Launches That Will Blow Your Mind
Future of Space Exploration Revealed Live

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction
Prepare pre-submitted audience questions in advance
Use YouTube's live stream countdown feature to build anticipation

visualDirection.description: Dynamic space-tech aesthetic with deep navy and electric blue color palette. Animated star field background. Futuristic, semi-transparent graphics overlaying space imagery. Modern sans-serif typography with technical, angular design. Subtle motion graphics showing rocket trajectories and orbital paths. Incorporate live stream elements like real-time comment overlay and interactive graphics.

exampleOutline: Opening: Live Stream Intro & Energy
Global Space Missions 2026 Overview
Top 5 Most Anticipated Launches
Deep Dive: Technical Mission Details
Live Q&A with Audience Interaction

ideas.title: Intel spinout Articul8 raises more than half of $70M round at $500M valuation
ideas.description: Articul8's valuation for its current funding round marks a roughly fivefold increase since its Series A.
hooks: AI Startup's Insane $500M Valuation: The Inside Story
How Articul8 Just Transformed Tech Funding
Intel Spinout's Massive Leap: $70M Funding Revealed

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings of funding news/graphics
Create clear chapter markers for complex funding discussion

visualDirection.description: High-energy tech aesthetic with electric blue and charcoal gray color palette. Geometric motion graphics showing funding progression. Sharp, modern sans-serif typography with dynamic transitions. Incorporate subtle Intel and startup ecosystem visual motifs. Use data visualization with animated growth charts and valuation milestones.

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic funding reveal (5-10s)
Context: Articul8's origin and Intel connection (1-2min)
Funding Journey: From Series A to current round (3min)
Industry Implications: What $500M means for AI startups (2-3min)
Closing: Future predictions and key takeaways (30-45s)

ideas.title: McKinsey and General Catalyst execs say the era of ‘learn once, work forever’ is over
ideas.description: Calacanis, General Catalyst's Taneja, and McKinsey's Sternfels discussed how AI is reshaping technology and the labor force.
hooks: AI is Destroying 'Learn Once, Work Forever'
Reskill or Get Left Behind: AI's New Rules
5 Steps to Survive the AI Career Revolution

tips: Use clear, numbered on-screen graphics for each step
Create dynamic screen transitions between tutorial sections

visualDirection.description: Bold, high-contrast design with futuristic blue-gray palette. Dynamic split-screen compositions showing before/after AI impact. Animated infographic elements. Sharp, geometric sans-serif typography. Motion design that emphasizes technological transformation and step-by-step progression.

exampleOutline: Section 1: Provocative AI Career Disruption Hook
Section 2: Traditional Career Model Breakdown
Section 3: Step-by-Step AI Adaptation Framework
Section 4: Skill Transformation Case Studies
Section 5: Actionable Reskilling Call-to-Action

ideas.title: Meta’s Manus news is getting different receptions in Washington and Beijing
ideas.description: Chinese officials are reportedly reviewing whether the Meta deal violates technology export controls, potentially giving Beijing leverage it wasn't initially perceived as having.
hooks: Tech Superpowers Clash: Meta's Global Gambit Unraveled
When AI Meets Geopolitics: Meta's Silent War
Beijing vs. Washington: The Manus Showdown

tips: Use archival geopolitical footage as B-roll
Include map animations showing tech export routes
Create dynamic lower-thirds with geopolitical data visualizations

visualDirection.description: Geopolitical documentary aesthetic: Muted cool tones (blues/grays), high-contrast typography, satellite/data overlay graphics, minimal but precise motion design, subtle parallax effects, incorporate world map and tech infrastructure visual metaphors

exampleOutline: Cold Open: Dramatic geopolitical tension scene
Historical Context of US-China Tech Relations
Meta's Manus Deal: Technical and Strategic Breakdown
Potential Global Implications and Power Dynamics
Future Scenarios and Expert Analysis Conclusion
